thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com | 3 of 5
thread.title: JENNIFER
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by JENNIFER

author: JENNIFER
title: JENNIFER
text: Car was very nice, clean. Customer service wasn't great at all. The person that checked me in wasn't nice at all. Verc's rental policies are not in-line with what other car rental companies are doing. If you don't sign up for their insurance, they'll charge you a $1,000 security deposit seems a bit extreme. Also, if you need to extend your rental, you have to return to the facility and go through the whole process that you initially did when renting the car not a very customer service orievtated company. I won't be doing business with them again.
